text: With advanced political method, and the pursuit and drive to create a true meritocracy, Hua Xin weaves his governance with remarkable productivity and effectiveness.
• Unique ministerial positions and faction effects
• Court positions provide effects that scale with rank of council member
A role that requires a booming voice and dominating presence, the Senior Internuncio serves as your most grand messenger, spreading your word and will to vassal, ally and enemy alike.
The most senior officer amongst your secretaries, The Master of Writing ensures that your orders are written concisely, and the correct commands are given to all your subordinates.
A crafty and wise personal advisor, a Gentleman Consultant has your ear at all times, whispering cunning ploys and ensuring that you are updated on rumours both far and wide.
By mapping the Heavens and predicting their movements and intent, the Court Astrologer forges a path for your armies, using the stars themselves to guide your soldiers to victory.
Responsible for the governance of your capital region, the Intendant manages your most vital territory, allowing you to delegate more responsibilites to local officials.
